description: Featuring Jake Taylor, Sam Crockett, Rick Matthews, and Jake Cannon.  It's Sam's last day visiting cousin Jake Taylor.  Jake has a surprise for his cuz'...he brings in the eager young Rick Matthews and horny stud Jake Cannon for a final send-off.  Sam loves it...and soon all four men are hard at work...working each others cocks and indulging in man-on-man sex...complete with a hefty dildo to work into the mix.  These four randy studs work each other into a sexual frenzy which leaves them all soaked and sated.
title: Family Secrets, Scene #04
